   |           ^^^^^^
   = help: Edition 2024 will be implemented in a future release

   |
19 | export message Foo1 {
   | ^^^^^^
   = help: `export` is part of Edition 2024, which will be implemented in a

error: unexpected `export` modifier on message field
  --> testdata/parser/def/2024.proto:22:5
   |
22 |     export int32 x = 1;
   |     ^^^^^^
  help: delete it
   |
22 | -     export int32 x = 1;
22 | +     int32 x = 1;
   |
   = help: `export` only applies to a type definition

  --> testdata/parser/def/2024.proto:23:5
   |
23 |     local int32 y = 1;
   |     ^^^^^
  help: delete it
   |
23 | -     local int32 y = 1;
23 | +     int32 y = 1;
   |
   = help: `local` only applies to a type definition
